bio.name: Bondan Banuaji
bio.intro: I'm an Informatics Engineering student from Karawang, Indonesia, passionate about experimenting with anything tech-related. From building modern web applications to tinkering with AI and creating immersive digital experiences.
bio.description1: I'm constantly exploring new technologies, pushing boundaries with creative development, and building projects that solve real-world problems.
bio.description2: Whenever I have some free time, I usually end up learning a new framework or experimenting with AI and view web experiences.

page.heroSubtitle: Creative technologist passionate about building immersive digital experiences
page.profileIntro: I'm a creative technologist with a passion for building immersive digital experiences. My journey began with a curiosity for how things work, which evolved into a career bridging the gap between design and engineering.
page.profileDescription: With over 5 years of experience, I specialize in creating high-performance websites and applications that not only look beautiful but also solve real-world problems. I believe in the power of code to tell stories and evoke emotions.
page.skillsSubtitle: The tools I use to bring ideas to life

problemSolver.title: Problem Solver
problemSolver.description: I thrive on tackling complex challenges and finding elegant solutions.

detailOriented.title: Detail Oriented
detailOriented.description: Precision and quality are at the heart of everything I build.

continuousLearner.title: Continuous Learner
continuousLearner.description: Always exploring new technologies and pushing boundaries.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Spirit
collaborative.description: Great products are built by great teams working together.

page.ctaSubtitle: I'm always excited to collaborate on new projects and innovative ideas.

description: Led a team of 5 developers in rebuilding the core product dashboard.
Improved application performance by 60% through code splitting and optimization.
Implemented a comprehensive design system using React and Tailwind CSS.
Developed award-winning immersive websites for Fortune 500 clients.
Integrated WebGL experiences using Three.js and GSAP.
Collaborated closely with designers to bridge the gap between design and code.
Built the MVP for a fintech platform from scratch.
Mentored junior developers and established code quality standards.
